context: DoorDash maintained US food delivery leadership with ~65% market share. The company expanded into grocery, retail, and international markets while achieving profitability milestones.

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Primary competitor with ~25% US market share, strong international presence

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Distant third in US, owned by Just Eat Takeaway, exploring sale options

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery leader, went public in 2023, competing in quick commerce

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Competing via Whole Foods delivery and Amazon Fresh

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery through Spark driver network

competitors.name: Target (Shipt)
competitors.notes: Same-day delivery competing in grocery and retail
